About Vizzion: Vizzion aggregates live road imagery and provides data and services to major brands in the mapping, media, safety & security, ITS (Intelligent Transportation Systems), and traffic & weather industries. Our imagery is used by millions of users every week, saving drivers time, money, and frustration, while also helping the environment by reducing vehicle emissions. Our dynamic team enjoys flexible hours, rapid professional development, and results-based rewards. We are located in North Vancouver, close to Phibbs Exchange and many amenities. Job Description: We are seeking a student developer to assist with a software project focused on iOS and Android development, with an emphasis on maps, geography, and image-related features. The ideal candidate has experience building mobile applications, working with mapping APIs, and handling geographic or image data. This is a paid, temporary position offering hands-on experience in a collaborative environment.
